text: America is in the middle of a housing crisis and only big ideas will solve it. My plan would build over 3 million homes, create 1.5 million jobs, and bring rents down by 10% – all without adding a dime to the deficit. https://www.thenation.com/article/affordable-housing-crisis-warren-booker-harris/

RT @usatodayopinion From @SenSanders and @RoKhanna: When you're shopping today, remember Walmart's owners have billions, while workers can barely afford to live, often forced to use government subsidies. We can do better. #BlackFriday  https://www.usatoday.com/story/opinion/2018/11/23/walmart-minimum-wage-15-black-friday-shopping-amazon-disney-column/2068959002/

All across the country, workers are standing up and demanding fairer wages — and they are winning. Since 2012 when striking fast-food workers launched the @fightfor15 movement, cities and states across the country have passed legislation to raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour.

The American people understand that something is fundamentally unfair when workers earn totally inadequate wages, while the corporations that employ them make billions in profits. Walmart: do the right thing. Raise your minimum wage to $15 an hour. https://www.usatoday.com/story/opinion/2018/11/23/walmart-minimum-wage-15-black-friday-shopping-amazon-disney-column/2068959002/

RT @SSWorks Bernie Sanders and Ro Khanna Have A Groundbreaking New Plan To Tackle Prescription Drug Rip-Offs: https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/bernie-sanders-ro-khanna-prescription-drugs_us_5bf3192ce4b01909c808652f http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsdjE7rX4AAIFIB.jpg

Thankful this Thanksgiving weekend for farmworkers in California and across the country whose hard work puts food on the table for millions of families.
https://twitter.com/ufwupdates/status/1065731591605903360 QT @UFWupdates Amadeo, a Ventura County farm worker, who labors to put food on your table, asked us to wish everyone a very happy #Thanksgiving. #WeFeedYou #ThankAFarmWorker http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dso9I10UcAE8YY3.jpg

In the first week of the new Congress, I intend to re-introduce my legislation to raise the federal minimum wage from $7.25 an hour to $15 an hour. This legislation would give more than 40 million low-wage workers a raise, more than 25 percent of the U.S. workforce.

Walmart insists it can't afford to pay workers $15/hr. Really? The Walton family, which owns Walmart, is the richest family in America—worth around $167 billion.

Walmart: do the right thing. Raise your minimum wage to a living wage of $15/hr. #BlackFriday
https://www.usatoday.com/story/opinion/2018/11/23/walmart-minimum-wage-15-black-friday-shopping-amazon-disney-column/2068959002/

RT @mdb2 Alec Smith died 3 days before his next paycheck, waiting to buy insulin.

• He aged off his mom’s insurance
• His job didn’t offer coverage
• He got a promotion making $40k/yr, too much for ACA subsidies or pharma assistance programs
• The cash price of his insulin was $1,300 https://twitter.com/SenSanders/status/1065291512597159936 QT @SenSanders Alec Smith died at 26 because he was rationing insulin that was too expensive. The greed of the pharmaceutical industry is killing Americans and it has got to stop. (with @NSmithholt12) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsiqSKnXoAA4Vtd.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1065286079379578881/vid/320x320/Sl3cEo7W2gJwD16A.mp4?tag=9

Congressman-Elect @Malinowski, thank you for your support. I look forward to working with you to protect health care, increase wages for workers by investing in infrastructure and take on Washington corruption #ForThePeople. —NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsuEj0cV4AIW-fq.jpg

The Trump administration tried to bury a new report about the devastating consequences of climate change. 

Why? Because Trump's actions are actively making it worse.

Our task is clear. We must immediately and dramatically reduce carbon pollution emissions. https://twitter.com/AP/status/1066046168814272512 QT @AP BREAKING: Massive federal report warns that extreme weather disasters, like California's wildfires and this year's hurricanes, are worsening in the United States. The White House report also frequently contradicts President Donald Trump. https://apnews.com/f9732784135c4f4a8963daff79e2583e?utm_medium=AP&utm_campaign=SocialFlow&utm_source=Twitter
@AdamParkhomenko Can we make sure @AdamParkhomenko gets some love!? We couldn’t have gotten there without you! 💯💪🙏

Somebody in America today can walk into a pharmacy and find out that the medicine they have been using for years can double, triple or quadruple overnight. The greed of the prescription drug industry is literally killing Americans and it has got to stop. https://thehill.com/blogs/congress-blog/healthcare/417713-sanders-and-khanna-have-a-plan-to-lower-your-drug-prices

Congratulations to South Korea’s Kim Jong Yang, whom @INTERPOL_HQ member states elected to head the organization. This Administration is once again trying to weaponize the census to depress a full and accurate count of the U.S. population. Absolutely shameful. 
https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1064635334275809285 QT @washingtonpost Trump administration officials suggested sharing census responses with law enforcement, court documents show https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/politics/wp/2018/11/19/trump-administration-officials-suggested-sharing-census-responses-with-law-enforcement-court-documents-show/

Very sad news — Bob loved his community, brought the NFL back to Houston, and worked tirelessly to make Texas and our nation a better place for everyone. He will be deeply missed. https://twitter.com/houstontexans/status/1066114153545416705 QT @HoustonTexans It is with deep sadness that we announce Houston Texans Founder, Senior Chairman and Chief Executive Officer and philanthropist, Robert C. McNair passed away peacefully in Houston today with his loving wife, Janice, and his family by his side. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsuY6IaVsAEvqqt.jpg
